create table SNP_METHOD_NEW2 ( I_METH <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC","10")?> NOT NULL, I_OBJECTS <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC","10")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, IND_NEW <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR","1")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, GRANT_CREATOR <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR","1")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, SHORT_NAME <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR","35")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, INT_JAVA_NAME <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR","35")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, DISP_POP_UP <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR","1")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, USE_CONTEXT <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR","1")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, FIRST_DATE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_DATE")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, FIRST_USER <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR","35")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, LAST_DATE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_DATE")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, LAST_USER <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR","35")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, POSITION <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC","10")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, )

insert into SNP_METHOD_NEW2 ( I_METH, I_OBJECTS, IND_NEW, GRANT_CREATOR, SHORT_NAME, INT_JAVA_NAME, DISP_POP_UP, USE_CONTEXT, FIRST_DATE, FIRST_USER, LAST_DATE, LAST_USER, POSITION ) select I_METH, I_OBJECTS, IND_NEW, GRANT_CREATOR, SHORT_NAME, INT_JAVA_NAME, DISP_POP_UP, USE_CONTEXT, FIRST_DATE, FIRST_USER, LAST_DATE, LAST_USER, POSITION from SNP_METHOD
DROP TABLE SNP_METHOD
sp_rename SNP_METHOD_NEW2, SNP_METHOD
alter table SNP_METHOD add constraint PK_METHOD primary key (I_METH)
